meanings.definition: To do something in a tiny way
meanings.sent1: He tinily painted the small fence.
meanings.sent2: The ant tinily carried the food to its nest.
meanings.sent3: She tinily danced on the tip of her toes.
meanings.sent4: The wind tinily whispered secrets through the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The artist tinily sketched the intricate details.
